name: Rakib Istiak
description: For 2022, you'll see some minor differences in the badging on the Telluride. Kia redesigned its logo and the Telluride emblem on the rear features a different font and wider spacing. All models now come standard with a 10.25-inch screen display that includes navigation, plus automatic climate control.

name: Emon
description: At Edmunds we tested a 2020 Telluride SX V6 AWD as part of our long-term test fleet. It's proved to be a comfortable, capable and dependable family hauler, and, if anything, our fondness for the Telluride has only grown after several thousand miles behind the wheel

name: Sanjida Snigdha
description: The 2022 Kia Telluride is available in four trim levels: LX, S, EX and SX. Each trim comes standard with a 3.8-liter V6 (291 horsepower, 262 lb-ft of torque) paired to an eight-speed automatic transmission. Front-wheel drive is standard
